name: Charmed
description: You are now charmed and consider this person a friend. Check with your DM what this means.

name: Blinded
description: You are now blinded and cannot visually see. Check with your DM what this means.

name: Deafened
description: You are now deafened and cannot hear. Check with your DM what this means.

name: Grappled
description: You are grappled. Your movement is 0.

name: Stunned
description: You are stunned. You are incapacitated, you fail strength and dex saving throws. Attacks against you have advantage

name: Poisoned
description: You are poisoned, Check with your DM what this means.
